name: 2048．
description:
2048 is a fun and easy math-puzzle game! It's very suitable for your family and kids to play together to fix those difficult issues!

• You should merge the number tiles.
• Each level we bring you a target.
• When the merged tile number values are equal to the level target, the level passed.
• 64 well designed levels.

It's our new 3-30 game, which means only 3 megabytes but can bring you over 30 minutes happiness time!

Hope you like our new puzzle game, more game please follow us https://www.tumblr.com/blog/azhuona
